accountId.description: The ID of the primary account under which the account group exists.

autoSubscribeAlertLevel.description: The severity level of email alerts sent to member users in the account group.

defaultGroup.description:
true — The account group is All Accounts, which the system creates automatically.
false — The account group is not All Accounts.

id.description: The ID of the account group.

name.description: The name of the account group as displayed on the **Account Information** tab of the **Setup** page.
